xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Wiki-overzicht platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Verwijderen platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=Wiki's
## Dependencies ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=The "Wiki" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki API" and "Wiki Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).
## Create ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.button=Create Wiki platform.wiki.create.title=Maak een nieuwe wiki platform.wiki.create.members=Deelnemers platform.wiki.create.prettyname.empty=Weergavenaam mag niet leeg zijn platform.wiki.create.error=Creatie van wiki "{0}" mislukt: {1}. platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.databasealreadyexists=Er bestaat al een database met deze identifier platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.wikialreadyexists=Deze identifier is al in gebruik platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.empty=Identifier van de wiki mag niet leeg zijn
## Common errors and messages platform.wiki.error.wikidoesnotexist=Wiki [{0}] bestaat niet. platform.wiki.error.oneParameterNotSpecified=De "{0}"-parameter is niet opgegeven. platform.wiki.error.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Meerdere waarden worden geaccepteerd. platform.wiki.error.exceptionWithMessage=Uitzondering: {0} platform.wiki.form.requiredField=Verplicht platform.wiki.csrf.error=Het beveiligings-token is ongeldig. Probeer het opnieuw alstublieft.
## Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is already a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is not a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=In order to continue, you need to {0}log in{1} first. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has accepted the invitation to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully accepted the invitation and joined the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully rejected the invitation to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=This wiki is invite only. To do so, you need to receive an invitation from one of its admins. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=The user {0}{1}{2} already has a pending request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. Please wait for a wiki admin to review it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Are you sure you want cancel the request to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Ja platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=Nee ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully cancelled the request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has requested to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully sent the request to join wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Weet u zeker dat u wilt deelnemen aan de wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Ja platform.wiki.users.join.no=Nee ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully joined wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=The user {0}{1}{2} is the owner of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. The owner of a wiki cannot leave it unless the wiki is deleted or the owner is changed. platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Weet u zeker dat u de wiki {0}{1}{2} wilt verlaten? platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Ja platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=Nee ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully left wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.title=Deelnemen platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Wiki "{0}" verlaten platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Wiki "{0}" verwijderen ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.delete.empty=Delete Wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=A reply message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate your decision. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=To join the wiki {0}{1}{2}, you must first issue a join request. After doing so, a wiki admin will review and consider your request. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=A message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate this join request. platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=U bent uitgenodigd deel te nemen aan de wiki {0}{1}{2}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Uitnodiging platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Antwoord platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Accepteren platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Afwijzen platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Later platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Bericht platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Verzoek verzenden platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Terug
## User profile platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.label=Deelnemer aan wiki's platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.notMemberOfAnyWiki=U bent nog geen deelnemer aan een wiki. platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.userNotMemberOfAnyWiki=De gebruiker is nog geen deelnemer aan een wiki. platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.title=Activiteiten van wiki {0} ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.hint=Generates an activity stream for the given wiki(s). platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.multipletitle=Activiteiten van wiki''s {0} platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.show=Toon activiteiten
## Wiki Deletion ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.confirmation=Are you sure you want to delete the wiki {0}{1}{2}? This action cannot be reverted! platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.retypeWikiId=Herhaal alstublieft de identifier van de wiki: ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.error.wikiIdDoesNotMatch=Type in the exact Wiki Identifier of the wiki that should be deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully deleted the wiki ''{3}''.
## Wiki macro ### Missing: platform.wiki.macro.noWikis=There are currently no wikis created (except the main one). rendering.macro.wikis.name=Wiki's rendering.macro.wikis.description=Toon alle wiki's
## LegacyWorkspaces macro rendering.macro.workspaces.name=Werkruimten (Legacy) ### Missing: rendering.macro.workspaces.description=Deprecated macro that should not be used here for compatibility reasons. Please use the "wikis" macro instead.
## Browse platform.wiki.browse=Wiki's bekijken platform.wiki.browse.emptyvalue=- platform.wiki.browse.wikiprettyname=Weergavenaam platform.wiki.browse.description=Omschrijving platform.wiki.browse.owner=Eigenaar platform.wiki.browse.membershipType=Type deelname platform.wiki.browse.doc.creationDate=Datum gemaakt platform.wiki.browse._actions=Acties platform.wiki.browse._actions.join=Deelnemen platform.wiki.browse._actions.requestJoin=Verzoek om deelname platform.wiki.browse._actions.viewInvitation=Bekijk uitnodiging platform.wiki.browse._actions.cancelJoinRequest=Annuleer verzoek platform.wiki.browse._actions.leave=Verlaten platform.wiki.browse._actions.delete=Verwijderen
## Classes WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_open=Elke gebruiker kan deelnemer worden WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_request=Elke gebruiker kan verzoeken deelnemer te worden, maar een beheerder moet het verzoek accepteren WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_invite=Alleen een beheerder kan uitnodigingen versturen voor deelname aan deze wiki WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_local_only=Alleen lokale gebruikers kunnen deze wiki gebruiken WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_global_only=Alleen globale gebruikers kunnen deze wiki gebruiken WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_local_and_global=Zowel globale als lokale gebruikers kunnen deze wiki gebruiken platform.wiki.prop.wikiname=Wiki Identifier platform.wiki.prop.wikiprettyname=Weergavenaam platform.wiki.prop.wikialias=Alias platform.wiki.prop.description=Omschrijving platform.wiki.prop.owner=Eigenaar platform.wiki.prop.membershipType.label=Type deelnemers platform.wiki.prop.membershipType.hint=De manier waarop gebruikers kunnen deelnemen aan deze wiki.
## Wizard platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=Unieke identifier van deze wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=Weergavenaam van deze wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=De domeinnaam die naar deze wiki verwijst. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Sjabloon dat moet worden gebruikt voor deze wiki (alle pagina's uit het sjabloon worden gekloond). platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=Een korte beschrijving van de wiki en zijn functie/doel. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=Gebruiker die altijd alle rechten heeft op deze wiki, ongeacht de ingestelde rechten in de beheeromgeving van de wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=De gebruikers die kunnen deelnemen aan deze wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Stap 1 - Kies een naam platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Naam platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Stap 2 - Kies de mogelijke deelnemers platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Gebruikers platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Opruimen platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Verwijder de wiki platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=De wiki {0} is succesvol verwijderd. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Fout: de wiki {0} is niet verwijderd. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=U staat op het punt de wiki {0} te verwijderen. Bevestig de verwijdering alstublieft. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Bevestigen platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=Deze wiki fungeert als Sjabloon. platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=Geen sjabloon (standaard) platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=Soort(en) gebruikers platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Kies welke soort(en) gebruikers toegang hebben tot de wiki platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Sjabloon platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Model / Sjabloon platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Model of Sjabloon dat wordt gebruikt voor de eerste inrichting van de nieuwe wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Model platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Sjabloon ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=After clicking on the "Create" button, the wiki will be created and the Distribution Wizard will be started in order to help you initialize your wiki. If you skip the wizard, your wiki will be empty. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Vorige stap platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Volgende stap platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Aanmaken
platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki aanmaken platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Een ogenblik geduld, de wiki wordt aangemaakt. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=De wiki {0} is succesvol aangemaakt. U kunt de wiki nu gebruiken. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.errorlog=However, error(s) have been generated during that process and you might want to review them. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=De wiki {0} is aangemaakt, maar de installatie van een aantal pagina''s is mislukt. Het is mogelijk dat de wiki hierdoor niet goed functioneert; u kunt de wiki het best verwijderen. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.go=Ga naar de wiki
## Admin admin.wikis.description=Wiki-beheer admin.wikis.templates=Sjablonen ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. admin.wikis.rights=Aanmaak-rechten
## XWikiServer Sheet platform.wiki.sheet.title=Beschrijving van de wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasalreadynotexists=Wiki-alias "{0}" bestaat al. platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasdoesnotexists=Wiki-alias "{0}" bestaat niet. platform.wiki.sheet.title.settings=Wiki-eigenschappen platform.wiki.sheet.title.createnewalias=Maak nieuwe alias platform.wiki.sheet.title.viewaliases=Aliassen bekijken platform.wiki.sheet.desc.wikiprettyname=De weergavenaam van deze wiki. platform.wiki.sheet.desc.owner=Gebruiker die beschikt over alle rechten over deze wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.secure=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with \"https\". ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.port=The port to use for all this wiki's generated externals URLs. If not set it's inherited from the configuration and the main wiki. Only taken into account for domain based URLs. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.iswikitemplate=Indicate if this wiki can be used as a template when creating a new wiki. platform.wiki.sheet.desc.server=Het alias dat wordt gebruikt voor toegang tot deze wiki. platform.wiki.sheet.desc.description=Een korte omschrijving van de wiki. platform.wiki.sheet.desc.homepage=De homepage van de wiki. platform.wiki.sheet.prop.wikiprettyname=Weergavenaam platform.wiki.sheet.prop.owner=Eigenaar platform.wiki.sheet.prop.secure=Beveiligd (SSL) ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.port=Port platform.wiki.sheet.prop.description=Omschrijving platform.wiki.sheet.prop.server=Alias platform.wiki.sheet.prop.homepage=Homepage platform.wiki.sheet.prop.iswikitemplate=Sjabloon ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor=This page defines how to access the \"{0}\" wiki, and some properties about it. For more configurations, please go to the platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=Beheerpagina van de wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.

Please click on "finalize" to perform the last operation. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.error=The wiki {0} has been created but some of the pages contained in the template have not been copied.
